title: Riot, we need to talk about this new Orianna Splashart.
body:
> http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Orianna_6.jpg

> http://cdn.leagueoflegends.com/apollo/content/jhin/BlondynkiTezGraja.jpg

Why the hell is it Jhin's hand in this picture?! This went from cool/mildly creepy to terrifying. D: (sorry for a lack of a good picture of his hand but that's the best one I could find. XD)  Either way, I saw the splash and thought to myself, "Wow that's kinda cool but Orianna's a bit creepy not really in a hugely bad fashi - wait that is a very ornately etched robot hand..." Then when I realized that Blitzcrank doesn't have petite hands nor would Victor put time and effort into beautifully etching designs into his robotic appendages meant for mass murder, mayhem, and world domination/evolution...yeah. Way to make this suddenly terrifying because you have to wonder what the heck is he planning with that cake and who's going to get it. XD

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

PS. Can we just get a Valentine Taric skin? (or any skin for that matter? ; u; Just wondering. <3)

replies.body: Too bad its Orianna's hand if you look closely the heartseeker Orianna is a cake decoration.
True enough, o.o I feel better now. I know I was missin' something but wasn't sure what. lol For some reason I thought Orianna's original hands were different.

> [{quoted}](name=Mira88,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=4fFPazBl,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-02-11T19:03:20.107+0000)
>
> True enough, o.o I feel better now. I know I was missin' something but wasn't sure what. lol For some reason I thought Orianna's original hands were different.

Also Jhin's mechanical hand is different colors and more blocky. not the feminine like pointed fingertips like Orianna.
Also Jhin has no mechanical parts at all, it was said from a rioter that once he removes everything else he looks pretty much like any other human.

Idk what that rioter was saying since while the rest of it looks more like armor, its kinda clear that his right arm is a prostetic(I know I butchered that :<) so there is most likely nothing under it .

No, he has at least a fully mechanical arm.
Just look at it.
It's Orianna's hand. ^-^ Heartseeker Orianna is a cake topper, and the Ball is a cake pop!
Unless I'm mistaken, are you guys no longer doing 20%~ discounts for the first few days? I haven't seen them in a very long while... :\
We no longer have launch discounts, no. This took effect in 2016 - you can grab more info [here](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/were-changing-discounts).
Excuse me but, those Heartseeker Orianna and Sweetheart Sona are legacy skins?
Nope!

Oh, thanks a lot Katey!

Then I can sleep in peace, dreaming about League of Hearts. ^^
Did you guys think about putting a Pin in that article ?
It[ was pinned](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/riot-official/Eq2E3E0X-weore-changing-up-discounts), but the announcement is 3 months old.

So {{champion:61}} is decorating a cake with a miniture version of herself?

That's actually kinda cute!
She is! :D

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} 


Once again someone thinks it Jhin. It is Orianna hand the figure is just a cake decoration.
we already have gay taric and hes pink.,, kind of valentines ish
I hope that's not Jhin's hand. We don't need champions taking up so much space in other's splashes. It's distracting and detracts from the main hero.

Oh I see it, it definitely is her classic skin's hand, just compare the joints to the hands on the Heartseeker Oriana. Also, the colors match Orianna, and not Jhin, who has a completely gold hand with no silver present. His joints are a blacker metal and the gold on his hand is more stylized than the one in this splash, so it's definitely not Jhin. 
On another note, Taric is locked out of skins until his rework rolls out. Seeing as we won't be getting his outrageous fabulous sexiness prior to Valentine's, we can only hope he's out in time for summer for a Pool Party skin.
I hope for heartseeker/sweetheart taric... but make it hot. Really hot
Taric isn't getting any skins until his visual update goes through in a few months.
